name: Blend'it
tagline: Crowd and world generator for blender3D
body:
### Welcome to Blend'it pages.

We are 9 Master students in the ENS Lyon. We will be working on the development of Python scripts and add-ons to Blender, to produce realistic crowd and swarm generators, as well as environment generators.



### Authors and Contributors
- @coma94
- @d1laj
- @rmonat
- @vlutfall
- @joseif
- @omariott
- @PijusSimonaitis
- @gullcomb
- @bboisson

### Work packages (in **bold**, the head of each Work Package)

* Communication @coma94, @joseif, **@rmonat**
* Blender Code **@coma94**, @PijusSimonaitis, @rmonat
* Bibliography on crowds @d1laj, **@joseif**, @vlutfall
* Bibliography on environments @bboisson, **@gullcomb**, @omariott
* Crowds plugin development @d1laj, @coma94, **@joseif**, @PijusSimonaitis, @vlutfall
* Environment plugin development @bboisson, @coma94, **@gullcomb**, @omariott, @rmonat 
* GUI development @coma94, @gullcomb, **@vlutfall**
* Trailer @d1lag, **@coma94**, @joseif

### Support or Contact

Please get in touch with @rmonat if you want more informations concerning this project. We are always interested in new ideas, and Blender artists to test our scripts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
